text: Balleroy-sur-Drôme is a commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Balleroy and Vaubadon.Arrêté préfectoral 23 December 2015 == References == This is a superstub. title: Balleroy-sur-Drôme
